Amina Mohamed (1908-1985) bụ onye Egypt na-agba egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.
Mohamed si n'ime ime obodo dara ogbenye, nke na-enweghị njikọ na ihe nkiri nka Cairo
Ya na nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Amina Rizq, nakwa nne ha kwagara Cairo; a kpọchiri ha abụọ n'ụlọ mgbe ha gosipụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ha
Amina nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'inweta aha dị ka onye na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.

Mohamed bụ onye nduzi, onye mmepụta, onye edemede, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye mere ihe nkiri nke Tita Wong (1937). E sere ihe nkiri ahụ na njikọ aka ya na otu ndị enyi nwere ọgụgụ isi, nke gụnyere onye nduzi Salah Abou Seif na ndị na-ese ihe Salah Taher na Abdel Salam El Sherif. Tita Wong, nke Mohamed gosipụtara, bụ nwa nwanyị nke ndị China dara ogbenye kwagara na Cairo, a manyere ya ịgba egwú na klọb abalị
N'ịbụ onye a na-ebo ebubo igbu nwanne nna ya, onye ọka iwu ya na-anwa ikwu na aka ya dị ọcha, na ihe na-egosipụta ndụ mbụ ya.
